name: Verify POST request with invalid base URL and valid request body

steps.name: Given  User sets Authorization to No Auth
Given  User sets request for Program module with invalid base URL and valid request body
When  User sends POST request with invalid URL and valid data from "ProgramPOSTValidData" and 7
Then  User gets Bad Request error message with status code "404" in response body with message Invalid URL
